TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: Trying to give the silent treatment... when you're naturally a quiet person.
When you learn that sentience is important.
Rps that move too fast and too slow at the same time.
When you got catchy songs stuck in your head because it has ,an awesome horn.
overheating

overheating

Sounds ike you need a Copper heatsink. Or am I overthinking this?

Wait a second, 42 is the answer of everything, so...

42!

Grinding my gears

and the person below me

Edited June 22, 2013 by willwolvescry
People with oversized signatures

The user above me

and the lack of trust in Kerbals.

Jebediah Kerman. Not because he's awesome, but because he has an unawesome name.

willwolvescry, it was a joke. I actually find most Pokemon to be quite adorable and cute.

I know I wanted to make a funny

also aerospaces and heavy rockets
not being able to get out into space with a freakin' plane

Injustice in movies or other scripted media.

Also not knowing how to air

Or Mun

Or Minmus

Or circularization

I hate just about everything

Government,lack of interest in science, fear of intelligence, incorrect grammar (your instead of you're), inflation, racist/sexist/homophobic people, taxes, stupid school system ect.
Heat and humidity. Also, bugs on the ceiling. Ick.
People who release a tsunami when pronouncing "p".
My own easily-distracted natur- OH BUNNEH~

Idiots.

So many people are so stupid...

not being able to get out into space with a freakin' plane

I feel you man.

Biggest thing of them all would have to be this:

When everyone gets punished because a few people had to go and mess things up.

This. I had to do this so many time by the past, I feel so bad each time I have to do it :/
Radical.... anything. People who are so determined to get out their political beliefs, thoughts about sexuality, religion, etc. that they basically resort to unreasonable personal attacks to do so.
Lying liars who tell lies. And take advantage of your emotions.
One other thing that really grinds my gears : When people don't stop complaining... Just enjoy what you've got!! (This does not include constructive criticism)

When people have a malfunctioning system (like a motor or a computer) and say something like, "It won't work!" Or, "It quit!" And then run out and buy a new one, when the real problem was something extremely simple or cheap.
